name: Sakura Story
description:
Sakura Story is a stealth game in development made by 1 person, 

Sakura Story is only 10% complete. 

Sakura is a 17 year old high school student studying at the school *School name*, She has intermittent explosive disorder, She has no control over her anger. The game will spend most of its time at school, where Sakura will commit her acts of brutality. Her goal is to eliminate all the girls who bullied Sakura. 

* More Information soon*

https://sakuralovestoryofficial.wordpress.com/
